name: acf-tools-lite
description: Claude Code plugins enforcing ACF quality patterns - validate logic consistency and optimize parallel execution across agent workflows

plugins.name: acf-challenger-mode
plugins.description: Reasoning validation mode - Systematic logic enforcer who rigorously validates completeness, consistency, and coherence. Perfect for requirements clarification, architecture review, and blocking execution on incomplete specifications.

plugins.name: acf-nitro
plugins.description: Parallel execution enforcement mode - Enthusiastic speed demon who catches sequential execution violations and calculates time waste. Enforces TodoWrite batching, parallel Task spawning, and parallel tool calls.

plugins.name: acf-power-commit
plugins.description: Conventional commit enforcer - Creates atomic, convention-compliant git commits with explicit file staging. Zero tolerance for git add -A.
